item.title: Crime News: Teen Charged After Killing his Mother
item.description: Pennsylvania State Police say an 18-year-old man is charged with homicide and attempted homicide after allegedly shooting both of his parents inside their Greene County home the day after Christmas. His mother later died from her injuries, while his father survived. The suspect was captured the following day after an extensive manhunt and is awaiting extradition.

media:content.media:title: Crime News: Teen Charged After Killing his Mother
media:content.media:description: Pennsylvania State Police say an 18-year-old man is charged with homicide and attempted homicide after allegedly shooting both of his parents inside their Greene County home the day after Christmas. His mother later died from her injuries, while his father survived. The suspect was captured the following day after an extensive manhunt and is awaiting extradition.

item.title: Crime News: Police Officer Allegedly Kills Gilfriend
item.description: Authorities in Atlanta say a police investigator is suspected of killing his girlfriend before taking his own life inside their home near Piedmont Park. The couple was found dead during a welfare check days after attending a Christmas party together, and investigators say the motive remains unclear as the case is reviewed.

item.title: Crime News: Reality TV Star Allegedly Murders Cellmate
item.description: Las Vegas police say former Mystery at Blind Frog Ranch cast member Chad Aaron Olinger has been charged with open murder after his cellmate was found dead inside the Clark County Detention Center. Investigators allege the killing happened just days before Olinger was scheduled to be released, and a competency hearing is now pending.

item.title: Caught on Camera! Woman Busted on Drug Charges Because of Pet Racoon
item.description: What started out as a simple traffic stop got pulled over for a violation and she ended up getting busted for something else entirely thanks to her pet raccoon.

item.title: Murder Suspect Attacked by Victim’s Family Member
item.description: Authorities in Albuquerque, New Mexico say that two men are facing charges this week after they started a wild courtroom brawl targeting an accused murderer.

item.title: Crime News: Suspect Arrested After Murder of Student
item.description: Authorities in the Brazilian state of Santa Katarina say that they have made an arrest in a horrifying case this week after a female graduate student was attacked and murdered on a popular coastal trail, a crime that has sparked nationwide outrage and renewed calls for women's safety.

item.title: Crime News: Suspect Arrested After Murder of Student

item.title: Crime News: Bodies Found in a Freezer
item.description: After a year and a half of unanswered questions, Austrian authorities have made a chilling discovery in the case of a missing mother and her 10-year-old daughter. What began as a routine missing-persons report has now escalated into a suspected double homicide, after investigators uncovered both victims hidden behind a false wall inside a private home.

item.title: Hidden Crime Revealed After Months
item.description: Police in South Korea uncover a disturbing truth after a woman’s year-long disappearance leads to an unexpected discovery inside her own home.

item.title: He lied in the interrogation...
item.description: Two young women’s murders shocked Vincennes. Years later, DNA evidence finally connected both cases to the same killer.

item.title: Queens Couple Found Dead in House Fire
item.description: An elderly couple in Queens were found dead after a house fire revealed signs of foul play. Police say a 42-year-old suspect has been arrested and charged in connection with their deaths.

item.title: Marine Veteran Found Dead in Houston Suburb
item.description: Authorities in Harris County are investigating the death of 28-year-old Marine veteran Jake Wynn, whose body was discovered along a roadside under suspicious circumstances.

item.title: Crimes of the Week: Man Arrested After Child’s Death on Indian Train
item.description: Authorities in India are investigating the death of 3-year-old Akash Rajendra Kumhar Shah, whose body was found on a Mumbai train. Police have arrested a relative in connection with the case.

item.title: Crimes of the Week: Authorities Investigate Woman’s Death in Cambodia
item.description: Cambodian officials are investigating the death of UK resident Jessica Carriot Hopkins, with law enforcement following potential leads.
